hero.subtitle: Yellow Point Media is a trusted, award-winning digital marketing agency based in Al-Ain — connecting brands and people through powerful storytelling and innovative strategies.

contact.title: Let’s Build Something Great
contact.description: Whether you're launching a new brand or scaling an existing one, we're here to help you break through. Let's start a conversation.

missionAndVision.missionText: To make your brand seen. We specialize in creating bold, high-visibility campaigns across digital and out-of-home media, delivering results that speak volumes.
missionAndVision.visionText: To be the region’s most trusted media partner — empowering audiences, clients, and communities through inspiring storytelling, strategic innovation, and meaningful connections.

Partners.title: Our Success Partners
Partners.description: From government entities to innovative startups, our partners trust us to build lasting connections through strategic media and design.

about.title: Built on Culture, Rooted in Results
about.description: Since 2018, Yellow Point Media has grown from a local agency into a leading force in digital marketing across the UAE and GCC. With deep cultural insight, technological expertise, and a results-first mindset, we help brands capture attention and deliver measurable impact.

list.title: Social Media Management
list.description: We plan, create and manage your social networks to maximize reach, engagement, and community impact.

list.title: SEO Optimization
list.description: We apply SEO best practices to help you rank at the top of Google.

list.title: Branding & Identity
list.description: We build strong, cohesive brand identities that resonate emotionally.

list.title: Content Strategy
list.description: Insight-driven content plans that elevate your brand's narrative.

list.title: Paid Ads
list.description: We build high-converting PPC campaigns across platforms.

list.title: Photography
list.description: Reels, podcasts, and content to amplify your visual brand.

list.title: Motion Graphics
list.description: Animated visuals that tell your story and boost engagement.

list.title: Web Development
list.description: Modern, responsive websites with fast, intuitive experiences.

Alert.title: Warning!
Alert.message: This is a beta version of the website and doesn't represent the final product because the owner hasn't provided further details or cooperation.
